comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Hi,

Just one question about Start app, i just checked connection to https website and found that Start is using Adguard certificate correctly.

Please find below screenshot of Start app showing connection details :

[Image]

So i think https filtering is working and i can see also in Adguard logs that ads are blocked only when https filtering is enabled.

So can i can use Start for browsing with Adguard ?

Thanks,
François-Régis

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

comment.body:
I can reproduce this issue only if I block request from `tl.foxnews.com`.
I guess that this request can be blocked when DNS filtering is enabled, as a CNAME of `taplytics.com`.

Could you please add these rules:
```adblock
foxnews.com#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'Taplytics', 'emptyObj')
foxnews.com#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'Taplytics.featureFlagEnabled', 'trueFunc')
```
to user rules, reload website and then check if issue still occurs?

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/171256#issuecomment-1907566087 есть несколько вариантов:
- установить AdGuard Extra
- сменить браузер на Chrome / Firefox и также установить наше расширение + AdGuard Extra
- остаться на яндекс браузере, но установить программу вместо расширения.

Дело в том, что яндекс браузер ограничивает доступ расширениям как к своим, так и бывшим браузерам. Поэтому если хотите продолжить пользоваться этим браузером, лучше установить вместо расширения программу с нашего сайта.

comment.body:
>reguły na osadzonego YouTube

Na przykład:
```adblock
||youtube.com^$important,domain=wp.pl|money.pl
```
albo (z regułą poniżej odtwarzacz powinien się dopiero załadować po kliknięciu w niego):
```adblock
||youtube.com^$important,subdocument,redirect=click2load.html,domain=wp.pl|money.pl
```

<hr>

Jeśli chodzi o odtwarzacz wp, to ta reguła:
```adblock
wp.pl,money.pl#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'WP.player', 'noopFunc')
```
powinna spowodować, że nie będzie się ładował.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body: The top ad is "js_sticky-top-ad" and the bottom one is "js_sticky-second-scroll". The bottom one only loads after you go to the bottom of the page for a little bit; it will load a new article under the one you are reading at the top of the new article. You will see it. I assume that's the one they saw, and just have not gotten the update yet.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
В таком случае лучше не блокировать - пользователи не узнают о таких акциях.
Можешь добавить правило ниже или сделать свое в пользовательских.
```adblock
avito.ru##div[class^="create-promocode-banner"]
```

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [https://www.index.hr/magazin/clanak/video-pogledajte-kako-se-studenti-u-zagrebackom-domu-na-savi-vesele-snijegu/2530854.aspx](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.index.hr%2Fmagazin%2Fclanak%2Fvideo-pogledajte-kako-se-studenti-u-zagrebackom-domu-na-savi-vesele-snijegu%2F2530854.aspx)
### Comment
> None of the videos on the website https://www.index.hr/ will play when AdGuard DNS is used. 
> 
> From what I understand, they use brid.tv for videos.
> 
> Note: if I disable AdGuard DNS video will play normally; after enabling it again, video will still play normally, along with other brid.tv videos on the website. 
> 
> I think that's because of cached scripts from brid.tv; because when I open the page in incognito/private tab, video won't play. I have to enable AdGuard DNS, refresh the page, then disable Adguard DNS and videos will continue working for the browsing session. 
> 
> Thanks for fixing the issue.

### [NSFW] Screenshots
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1</summary>

  [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/r967a2oab5wkggss0gc0sg800g88oosdbsfgm0kg5c.png?nc=1)

</details>

[LINK TO THE ISSUE](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/issues/493)

Please wait until it is solved there.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, you’re probably already using AdGuard Extra so you just need to wait until it is updated.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

comment.body:
@zloyden в общем списке объявлений на превью каждого объявления есть информация об этой же акции, в разделе уведомлений приходит каждый раз уведомление об этой акции (его ещё никак не отключить), а также при открытии объявления перед объявлением есть информация об этой акции, так что пользователи её не пропустят. А большинство всё же пользуются только бесплатными функциями платформы, и им не нужно никакое платное продвижение.
